item.title: About Me
item.author: 41935630v@gmail.com (xid3)
item.description:
I am currently a third-year student in the Department of Computer Science and Information Engineering at National Central University.

I am a beginner in web penetration testing and CTF competitions and am actively studying topics related to web security. On this blog, I share my learning experiences as well as occasional anything from my daily life.
